What are the key features and benefits of the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and how does Verus Vault enhance the security of VerusIDs?

The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform that enables users to buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs (non-fungible tokens) directly on the blockchain. This platform allows for peer-to-peer transactions, eliminating the need for intermediaries. With this marketplace, users can advertise their offers directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post their sale publicly on the blockchain for anyone to see.

One of the key benefits of this platform is its transparency and privacy features. Users can execute transactions from either transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses, which are still auditable by them. This means that users have control over their transactions and can maintain their privacy if needed.

Another important aspect of the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is that it allows owners to select and share proceeds with value-added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in the digital ownership economy. This creates a new economy of provable digital ownership, where creators and owners can benefit from their digital assets.

Verus Vault is a security feature that enhances the protection of funds on a VerusID. By locking a VerusID with Vault, users can prevent funds from being spent from that identity until it is unlocked. However, users can still stake those funds on the Verus network and earn rewards. Additionally, users can still receive funds while their VerusID is locked.

To enable revocation, recovery, and all Verus Vault capabilities, users need to have at least one primary identity and one revocation/recovery ID configured. This ensures that users have a secure and decentralized way to manage their digital identities and assets.

In summary, the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace provides a decentralized platform for buying and selling digital assets, while Verus Vault enhances the security of VerusIDs by preventing unauthorized spending and ensuring that users have control over their digital assets.

### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
